name: The Adventures of Hannah and Mcefi: Brick Breakers
name_original: The Adventures of Hannah and Mcefi: Brick Breakers
description:
Hannah and Mcefi: Brick Breakers is not your average bricks of egypt style game.
This game features 100% hand-drawn graphics, an original soundtrack, and hilarious hijinks.
This game could easily be completed within the span of an hour. It was created in Gamemaker Studio 2 as a final project for a college course. This game took two weeks to design and code.

Set in the universe of the Adventures of Hannah and Mcefi webcomic series, this game features Hannah, Mcefi, and Ingy as they traverse the new game Hannah has created for them to play. Only, some things go very, very wrong and the girls have to figure out how to fix things before it's too late.
